name: dockmate
author: Gautam Perumal (https://goobles.netlify.app/)
description: Dockmate is a versatile CLI tool designed to simplify Docker workflows for JavaScript-based projects. It streamlines tasks like generating Dockerfiles, building Docker images, and running containers. With support for frameworks such as React, Angular, Next.js, Vue.js, and more, Dockmate is your go-to helper for containerizing applications effortlessly.
